name: Supplies
description: Essential resources used for upgrading weapons and armor. Found everywhere in Tsushima.

name: Bamboo
description: Flexible wood used to upgrade bows. Grows in dense forests.

name: Yew Wood
description: Strong, flexible wood required for advanced bow upgrades. Found in specific wooded areas.

name: Wax Wood
description: Rare and durable wood used for the finest bow enhancements. Found near Shinto Shrines.

name: Iron
description: Common metal used to upgrade the Katana and Tanto. Found in Mongol camps.

name: Steel
description: Refined metal needed for high-level blade upgrades. Often guarded by Mongol leaders.

name: Gold
description: Precious metal required for the ultimate Katana upgrades. A reward for liberating major strongholds.

name: Linen
description: Basic cloth used for armor upgrades. Found near settlements.

name: Leather
description: Tough hide used for advanced armor upgrades. Dried by tanners across the island.

name: Silk
description: Luxurious fabric needed for the final armor upgrades. A rare gift often associated with allies.

name: Flowers
description: Colorful blooms traded for new armor dyes at merchants. Can be found in open fields.

name: Predator Hides
description: Skins from bears and wild boars. Used to increase the capacity of ranged and quickfire weapons.

name: Kunai
description: Small throwing blades that can stagger enemies. Perfect for breaking a charge.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: Unleashes a cloud of smoke that blinds enemies, allowing for assassinations or escape.

name: Sticky Bomb
description: Pitch-covered bomb that sticks to an enemy and explodes after a short delay.

name: Black Powder Bomb
description: Explosive that deals damage and staggers groups of enemies. Concussive force.

name: Wind Chime
description: Thrown bell that distracts enemies and draws them away from their posts.
